name: Bricks 3D
tagline: The classic Bricks game in 3D using WebGL
body:
### Welcome
This is the official project page of Bricks 3D on GitHub.

The game was originally created for [Mozilla's Dev Derby](https://hacks.mozilla.org/2013/08/announcing-the-winners-of-the-june-2013-dev-derby/) challenge in June 2013, which focused on WebGL, and was judged as a runner up.

A [demo](www.robinmitra.com/projects/brick-3d) can also be found on my personal website.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
